name: Color Smash Splash
description:
Made in 2 days to catch the end of the Weekly Game Jam 112, theme "Color the World". 

Further progress is planned to add features and many missing elements.

A fast-paced arcade game where you smash around color blobs and splash them into slots of corresponding colors to fill the board as fast as possible.

Use Arrow-Keys (or WASD) to smash around the color blob. Once over a tile with a corresponding color, use Space to splash it in and fill up that tile. If you try filling the wrong colored tile, you'll regret it. Have fun!
